channel.title: Indian :: Ray's Recipe's
channel.description: Foreword A collection of Indian Recipe’s. mostly Curry’s or Naan Curry’s Chicken Tikka Masala Naan

item.title: Chicken tikka masala
item.description: Foreword This is the Recipe i use to make Chicken Tikka Masala. as always, keep in mind i go alot by feeling! adjust it to your liking. the list of spices used will be at the very end if you dont have them at home! Tip if you want to make this, marinate the chicken for a day for the best result! or at least a couple of hours
